'''Hydrological Studies in Byakuyakoku''' is a Quest Item obtained through completing the World Quest [[Date's Challenge]]. At the end of [[Collection of Dragons and Snakes]], it is handed in, and can be interacted with after the quest completes to obtain Vol. 3 in [[The Byakuyakoku Collection]].
